title: Kardboard Kings (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Ready to run your own card shop? Epic Games Store is giving away Kardboard Kings for FREE! Dive into this fun, card shop simulator where you can collect, trade, and sell tons of unique cards. Customize your dream shop with awesome decorations and build the card shop of your dreams!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Invincible Presents: Atom Eve (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Become Atom Eve today! Get Invincible Presents: Atom Eve without any cost via Epic Games Store! Invincible Presents: Atom Eve is an original visual novel game where you play as Atom Eve, the fan-favorite superhero from the Invincible universe!
instructions:
1. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
2. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
